info.label: Software Developer
info.brief: I'm a Developer and full time nerd juggling work life and studies, trying to find some time to pursue my aspirations of a career in Cybersecurity.

history.summary:
Development and maintenace of an intelligent industrial control software and reestructuring the products licenses renewal process to use TOTP (Time-Based One Time Passwords). Experience as developer for the company’s flagship products, Leaf, SmartFlow & Seeds,
        softwares for control and optimization of industrial processes, built with C++, Qt and gRPC.

Working helping Sales and R&D with development, client support and documentation. During this time I had the chance to work helping the company with some security and data privacy compliances and policies like EU's General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and drafting the Cloud Security Alliance's Security, Trust & Assurance Registry (CSA STAR) self-assesment.
Working as iOS Developer for Saffe, a Germany based start-up developing an app using world-class facial recognition technology to make payments easier and more secure.

Beer Love is an app where you can discover new beer, share you experiences and rate the new beer you try. Intending to expand the beer culture, it brings breweries and users closer by promoting challenges and prizes.

projects.title: Liris

highlights: Large project dealing with sensitive data over protected networks deployed securely to AWS
Developed multiple APIs - REST, GraphQL and GRPC

projects.title: Sistema Blox
projects.description: A full web-based ERP for managing schools under a new and innovative educational system. Developed in Ruby on Rails and React
highlights: Responsible for software architecture and database management
Responsible for developing, documenting and testing the GraphQL API

projects.title: Social-ID for IBM UBX
projects.description: A set of plugins and APIs to allow easy communication between Social-ID social platform and IBM cloud solutions. Development in Java and Ruby
highlights: Responsible for software architecture and development with direct aid from senior IBM engineers
Awarded with an opportunity to present solution at IBM Amplify 2017

history.title: Professional Penetration Tester
history.summary: This course aims to form a complete professional pentester teaching from basic concepts of the analysis process & technologies to advanced techniques where the students will develop their own tools and exploits. The course has an unique methodology divided between Theory, Research and Practice emulating a real enviroment at all times.

history.title: B.Sc. Degree in Computer Science
history.summary: Ongoing B.Sc. Degree in Computer Science by the University of Campinas. The degree covers a broad variety of subjects such as Programming languages, OS, Computer Networks, Computer Graphics, Databases, A.I, Software Engineering, Computer Architectures, among others.
